title: Lackawanna Man Sentenced on Gun Charge (ATF - Bureau of Alcohol, Tobacco, Firearms and Explosives) ...
text: ( Source : ATF - Bureau of Alcohol, Tobacco, Firearms and Explosives ) BUFFALO, N.Y. -U.S. Attorney William J. Hochul Jr. announced today that Anthony Watkins, 32, of Lackawanna, NY , who was convicted of unlawful possession of a firearm by a
